Ongoing Projects

  • BSISO & MJO Simulation: Assessing CMIP6 model skill in subseasonal variability.
  • Convective Instability Metrics: CAPE/CIN trends and their role in rainfall prediction.
  • Aerosol–Monsoon Interactions: Investigating black carbon, organic carbon, and their influence on rainfall.
  • Unified Model Diagnostics: Site-specific forecasts for SHAR and Indian regions.
